name: 10. Not gate
description: An important component in a computer is a NOT gate. The gold pixels represent the gun that will provide the input signal. Your goal is to make the numbers 01 and 10, depending on whether the yellow gun is on or off.

detectors.description: Input detector - should be OFF when no input is present
Output detector - should be ON when no input is present

testScenarios.name: Input High (1) → Output Low (0)
testScenarios.description: When the input gun is active, the NOT gate output should be disabled (detector shows 0)

detectors.description: Input detector - should remain ON when input is present
Output detector - should remain OFF when input is present

testScenarios.name: Input Low (0) → Output High (1)
testScenarios.description: When the input gun is inactive, the NOT gate output should be enabled (detector shows 1)

detectors.description: Input detector - should be OFF when no input is present
Output detector - should be ON when no input is present
